hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by a man from Bani Salamah ibn Sa'd, from his mother, that her uncle Habib ibn Fuwayc narrated to her: His father brought him to the Prophet ﷺ and his eyes were completely whitened, unable to see anything. He asked him: What has afflicted you? He replied: I was a handsome man and my foot stepped on the eggs of a snake and I became afflicted. So the Prophet ﷺ spat in his eye and he was able to see. After that I saw him threading a needle with those eyes, and he was eighty years old and his eyes were bright.
